page.title: 05VILLAGE HALL.
page.content: The Village Hall is the hub of the area's life, with it's own management committee and caretaker. The Parish Council's seven members meet there monthly and hold an Annual Wine and Cheese open Meeting for the electorate. The Village Hall is run by a dedicated committee and the Hall is used regularly by the Play Group, Women's Guild, the PTA, Youth Club and for private functions and dances. Every April for three nights the Village Hall Variety Show is presented, displaying a wealth of local talent, now in it's tenth year. The traditional Harvest Supper is held each October and a very popular Fur and Feather Whist Drive each December. The PTA organises an Annual Fete and Show in August. An extension was added in 1984. Each year an Oreton Charities team enters Bridgnorth Sponsored walk.
